item.title: West Air's inaugural international route links Chongqing with Singapore
item.description: Source: Changi Airport Group. A West Air aircraft. Changi Airport welcomed a new airline, West Air, which launched its first international route from Chongqing, China. West Air, headquartered in Chongqing, will fly between Singapore and the Western Chinese city three times a week. The airline will utilize an Airbus A320-200 with a capacity of 180 seats for this route. This new service marks West Air’s first venture into the international market and stems from a 2016 agreement to boost air travel between Singapore and Chongqing.

item.title: Sage Hotel in West Perth has been opened by Silverneedle
item.description: Source: Silverneedle. Sage Hotel, West Perth. SilverNeedle, a hotel group based in Singapore, has partnered with Australian Development Capital (ADC), a Perth-based real estate developer, to open a new Sage Hotel in West Perth. This A$35 million project marks the debut of the Sage Hotel brand in Perth, a city gaining popularity among Singaporean business and leisure travelers, and positions the brand within the upscale hotel market. Sage aims to provide a unique experience that reflects the local community and goes beyond standardized global hospitality.
